text: wla tatamanawa ma fddal allah bih baedakum ealaa bed, fi almawahib walarzaq waghayr dhlk, faqad jaeal allah lilrijal nsybana mqddarana min aljaza' bhsb emlhm, wajaeal lilnisa' nsybana mimaa emln, was'aluu allah alkarim alwahhab yuetikm min fadlih badalaan min altmny. 'iina allah kan bikuli shay' elymana, wahu 'aelam bima yuslih eibadih fima qsmh lahum min khyr
